item.title: Grand Central Dispatch
item.description: Overview GCD helps to write multi-threaded code, create threads and schedule tasks on those threads. Main building block: Dispatch Queues, 3 types of queues: Main dispatch queue (serial, pre-defined) drawing app’s UI ðŸŽ¨ handle events (e.g. user interaction) block it for too long, app will freeze ðŸ¥¶ Global queue (concurrent, pre-defined) Private queue (can be serial/concurrent optionally, serial by default) Usage: Making a network call, which takes a long time in background queue When it completes, updating UI on main thread.
